ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 29
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, and it is suppose to reduce the wt of a object placed in it to 0 . and has like 10 slots... I dont know if this is true, but that is what was stated...
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, and it is suppose to reduce the wt of a object placed in it to 0 . and has like 10 slots... I dont know if this is true, but that is what was stated... Although there are so many items that do that now, i almost find it hard to believe...

Wes Lobdell,
Quote: +ACI-I don't want to achieve immortality through my work. I want to achieve
it through not dying.+ACI-
-Woody Allen
------------------------
My all time favorite Oxymorons:
exact estimate, plastic silverware, genuine imitation, mud bath, original copy, student teacher, alone together, anarchy rules, bitter sweet, bankrupt millionaire, black light, butt-head, casual sex, clean dirt, coed sorority, cold as hell, computer jock, constant change, cowardly lion, curved line(according to the mathematical definition of a line), delibrate mistake, dry wine, earth angel(ok thats just going back a ways +ADs-), educational television, even odds, found missing, freezer burn, fresh cheese, full-length bikini, half full, half naked, hard water, hells angels, idiot savant, jumbo shrimp, less is more, and finally my all time FAVORITE OXYMORON....: 'Microsoft works'+ACEAIQAhACEAIQAh-

From: +ACI-carlos+ACI- quatoria+AEA-tlxnet.net

The tinkerer's bag does exist, and tis not the one off the bats in SolB.
Tis in SolA, in the gnome citadel, and the price quoted to me at max
charisma, (130), is 5500pp. If I didn't blow so much improving my crafting
skill, I'd have one by now. sigh


Salkiri As'ad
Gnomish Enchantress
40th level
Veeshan Server
